articles.title: Gunman Kills 5 People in Midtown Manhattan Skyscraper, Including Himself
articles.description: A gunman wielding a semiautomatic assault rifle entered a Midtown Manhattan skyscraper, killing four people before fatally turning the gun on himself. The shooter was identified as 27-year-old Shane Tamura of Las Vegas, who reportedly drove across the U.S. to carry out the attack.

articles.title: Russian Airstrikes Hit Prison in Ukraine, Killing 17 People
articles.description: Russian strikes hit a prison in Zaporizhzhia, Ukraine, killing 17 people and wounding 42. A hospital in the Dnipro region was also hit, resulting in three deaths, including a pregnant woman. These attacks coincide with President Trump's shortened deadline for Russia to agree to a ceasefire.

articles.title: Trump Threatens India with Tariffs as High as 25%
articles.description: President Donald Trump threatened to raise tariffs on Indian imports up to 25% if a long-sought trade agreement isn't reached. He stated, 'They are going to pay 25%,' emphasizing the need for further negotiations between the two countries.
